basics.name: Edwin V. Bonilla
basics.label: Machine Learning Research Scientist
basics.summary: Machine learning scientist driven by challenging problems in probabilistic modelling, causal discovery and inference, and the optimal design of experiments.

work.summary: Lead a team of 8–10 researchers in developing new methods for foundational machine learning.
